Options.Name: resource_group_name
Options.Documentation: The name of the resource group.

Options.Name: container_group_name
Options.Documentation: The name of the container group.

Options.Name: container_group
Options.Documentation: The properties of the container group to be created or updated.

Options.Name: location
Options.Documentation: Resource location. If not set, location from the resource group will be used as default.

Options.Name: containers
Options.Documentation: The containers within the container group.

SubOptions.Name: name
SubOptions.Documentation: The user-provided name of the container instance.

SubOptions.Name: image
SubOptions.Documentation: The name of the image used to create the container instance.

SubOptions.Name: command
SubOptions.Documentation: The commands to execute within the container instance in exec form.

SubOptions.Name: ports
SubOptions.Documentation: The exposed ports on the container instance.

SubOptions.Name: protocol
SubOptions.Documentation: The protocol associated with the port.

SubOptions.Name: port
SubOptions.Documentation: The port number exposed within the container group.

SubOptions.Name: environment_variables
SubOptions.Documentation: The environment variables to set in the container instance.

SubOptions.Name: name
SubOptions.Documentation: The name of the environment variable.

SubOptions.Name: value
SubOptions.Documentation: The value of the environment variable.

SubOptions.Name: resources
SubOptions.Documentation: The resource requirements of the container instance.

SubOptions.Name: requests
SubOptions.Documentation: The resource requests of this container instance.

SubOptions.Name: memory_in_gb
SubOptions.Documentation: The memory request in GB of this container instance.

SubOptions.Name: cpu
SubOptions.Documentation: The CPU request of this container instance.

SubOptions.Name: limits
SubOptions.Documentation: The resource limits of this container instance.

SubOptions.Name: memory_in_gb
SubOptions.Documentation: The memory limit in GB of this container instance.

SubOptions.Name: cpu
SubOptions.Documentation: The CPU limit of this container instance.

SubOptions.Name: volume_mounts
SubOptions.Documentation: The volume mounts available to the container instance.

SubOptions.Name: name
SubOptions.Documentation: The name of the volume mount.

SubOptions.Name: mount_path
SubOptions.Documentation: The path within the container where the volume should be mounted. Must not contain colon (:).

SubOptions.Name: read_only
SubOptions.Documentation: The flag indicating whether the volume mount is read-only.

Options.Name: image_registry_credentials
Options.Documentation: The image registry credentials by which the container group is created from.

SubOptions.Name: server
SubOptions.Documentation: The Docker image registry server without a protocol such as "http" and "https".

SubOptions.Name: username
SubOptions.Documentation: The username for the private registry.

SubOptions.Name: password
SubOptions.Documentation: The password for the private registry.

Options.Name: restart_policy
Options.Documentation:
Restart policy for all containers within the container group. 
- `Always` Always restart
- `OnFailure` Restart on failure
- `Never` Never restart
.

Options.Name: ip_address
Options.Documentation: The IP address type of the container group.

SubOptions.Name: ports
SubOptions.Documentation: The list of ports exposed on the container group.

SubOptions.Name: protocol
SubOptions.Documentation: The protocol associated with the port.

SubOptions.Name: port
SubOptions.Documentation: The port number.

SubOptions.Name: type
SubOptions.Documentation: Specifies if the IP is exposed to the public internet.

SubOptions.Name: ip
SubOptions.Documentation: The IP exposed to the public internet.

Options.Name: os_type
Options.Documentation: The operating system type required by the containers in the container group.

Options.Name: volumes
Options.Documentation: The list of volumes that can be mounted by containers in this container group.

SubOptions.Name: name
SubOptions.Documentation: The name of the volume.

SubOptions.Name: azure_file
SubOptions.Documentation: The name of the Azure File volume.

SubOptions.Name: share_name
SubOptions.Documentation: The name of the Azure File share to be mounted as a volume.

SubOptions.Name: read_only
SubOptions.Documentation: The flag indicating whether the Azure File shared mounted as a volume is read-only.

SubOptions.Name: storage_account_name
SubOptions.Documentation: The name of the storage account that contains the Azure File share.

SubOptions.Name: storage_account_key
SubOptions.Documentation: The storage account access key used to access the Azure File share.

SubOptions.Name: empty_dir
SubOptions.Documentation: The empty directory volume.

ResponseFields.Name: id
ResponseFields.Description: The resource id.

ResponseFields.Name: name
ResponseFields.Description: The resource name.

ResponseFields.Name: type
ResponseFields.Description: The resource type.

ResponseFields.Name: location
ResponseFields.Description: The resource location.

ResponseFields.Name: tags
ResponseFields.Description: The resource tags.

ResponseFields.Name: provisioning_state
ResponseFields.Description: The provisioning state of the container group. This only appears in the response.

ResponseFields.Name: containers
ResponseFields.Description: The containers within the container group.

SubFields.Name: name
SubFields.Description: The user-provided name of the container instance.

SubFields.Name: image
SubFields.Description: The name of the image used to create the container instance.

SubFields.Name: command
SubFields.Description: The commands to execute within the container instance in exec form.

SubFields.Name: ports
SubFields.Description: The exposed ports on the container instance.

SubFields.Name: protocol
SubFields.Description: The protocol associated with the port. Possible values include: 'TCP', 'UDP'

SubFields.Name: port
SubFields.Description: The port number exposed within the container group.

SubFields.Name: environment_variables
SubFields.Description: The environment variables to set in the container instance.

SubFields.Name: name
SubFields.Description: The name of the environment variable.

SubFields.Name: value
SubFields.Description: The value of the environment variable.

SubFields.Name: instance_view
SubFields.Description: The instance view of the container instance. Only valid in response.

SubFields.Name: restart_count
SubFields.Description: The number of times that the container instance has been restarted.

SubFields.Name: current_state
SubFields.Description: Current container instance state.

SubFields.Name: state
SubFields.Description: The state of the container instance.

SubFields.Name: start_time
SubFields.Description: The date-time when the container instance state started.

SubFields.Name: exit_code
SubFields.Description: The container instance exit codes correspond to those from the `docker run` command.

SubFields.Name: finish_time
SubFields.Description: The date-time when the container instance state finished.

SubFields.Name: detail_status
SubFields.Description: The human-readable status of the container instance state.

SubFields.Name: previous_state
SubFields.Description: Previous container instance state.

SubFields.Name: state
SubFields.Description: The state of the container instance.

SubFields.Name: start_time
SubFields.Description: The date-time when the container instance state started.

SubFields.Name: exit_code
SubFields.Description: The container instance exit codes correspond to those from the `docker run` command.

SubFields.Name: finish_time
SubFields.Description: The date-time when the container instance state finished.

SubFields.Name: detail_status
SubFields.Description: The human-readable status of the container instance state.

SubFields.Name: events
SubFields.Description: The events of the container instance.

SubFields.Name: count
SubFields.Description: The count of the event.

SubFields.Name: first_timestamp
SubFields.Description: The date-time of the earliest logged event.

SubFields.Name: last_timestamp
SubFields.Description: The date-time of the latest logged event.

SubFields.Name: name
SubFields.Description: The event name.

SubFields.Name: message
SubFields.Description: The event message.

SubFields.Name: type
SubFields.Description: The event type.

SubFields.Name: resources
SubFields.Description: The resource requirements of the container instance.

SubFields.Name: requests
SubFields.Description: The resource requests of this container instance.

SubFields.Name: memory_in_gb
SubFields.Description: The memory request in GB of this container instance.

SubFields.Name: cpu
SubFields.Description: The CPU request of this container instance.

SubFields.Name: memory_in_gb
SubFields.Description: The memory limit in GB of this container instance.

SubFields.Name: cpu
SubFields.Description: The CPU limit of this container instance.

SubFields.Name: volume_mounts
SubFields.Description: The volume mounts available to the container instance.

SubFields.Name: name
SubFields.Description: The name of the volume mount.

SubFields.Name: mount_path
SubFields.Description: The path within the container where the volume should be mounted. Must not contain colon (:).

SubFields.Name: read_only
SubFields.Description: The flag indicating whether the volume mount is read-only.

ResponseFields.Name: image_registry_credentials
ResponseFields.Description: The image registry credentials by which the container group is created from.

SubFields.Name: server
SubFields.Description: The Docker image registry server without a protocol such as "http" and "https".

SubFields.Name: username
SubFields.Description: The username for the private registry.

SubFields.Name: password
SubFields.Description: The password for the private registry.

ResponseFields.Name: restart_policy
ResponseFields.Description:
Restart policy for all containers within the container group. 
- `Always` Always restart
- `OnFailure` Restart on failure
- `Never` Never restart
. Possible values include: 'Always', 'OnFailure', 'Never'

ResponseFields.Description: The IP address type of the container group.

SubFields.Name: ports
SubFields.Description: The list of ports exposed on the container group.

SubFields.Name: protocol
SubFields.Description: The protocol associated with the port. Possible values include: 'TCP', 'UDP'

SubFields.Description: The port number.

SubFields.Description: Specifies if the IP is exposed to the public internet.

SubFields.Description: The IP exposed to the public internet.

ResponseFields.Name: os_type
ResponseFields.Description: The operating system type required by the containers in the container group. Possible values include: 'Windows', 'Linux'

ResponseFields.Description: The list of volumes that can be mounted by containers in this container group.

SubFields.Description: The storage account access key used to access the Azure File share.

SubFields.Name: empty_dir
SubFields.Description: The empty directory volume.

ResponseFields.Description: The instance view of the container group. Only valid in response.
